title: Innovative Solutions Announces Successful Use of DarcyIQ in Strategic Collaboration Agreement with AWS Focused on Smaller Businesses
description: Innovative Solutions, a Premier Tier AWS Partner and global leader of Generative AI, Data, and Cloud services solutions for growing businesses, today announced that the company has achieved several important milestones in its Strategic Collaboration Agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) focused on helping small and medium businesses (SMBs) achieve meaningful growth. Innovative Solutions was a launch partner for the AWS SMB Competency in January 2024, and as such, is one of a small subse
content:
A Premier Tier AWS Partner with a specialized focus on SMBs, Innovative Solutions is distinctly positioned to help growing businesses leverage the power of AWS

ROCHESTER, N.Y., Aug. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- , a Premier Tier AWS Partner and global leader of Generative AI, Data, and Cloud services solutions for growing businesses, today announced that the company has achieved several important milestones in its Strategic Collaboration Agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) focused on helping small and medium businesses (SMBs) achieve meaningful growth. Innovative Solutions was a launch partner for the AWS SMB Competency in January 2024, and as such, is one of a small subset of AWS partners uniquely positioned to help emerging and growing companies on AWS.

Uniquely, Innovative utilized DarcyIQ, an agentic AI consulting platform that accelerates sales, to rapidly reach, inspire, and assist SMBs with growing on the AWS cloud. Using DarcyIQ, Innovative has tripled new customer acquisition in the SMB segment in the last 8 months.

"Innovative Solutions was born out of the SMB space and our mission is to help every SMB leverage the power of AWS," added Justin Copie, CEO of Innovative Solutions. "Right now, SMB cloud spend is expected to reach $578B over the next two years, and at the same time, the overwhelming majority (91%) of small business technology transactions are facilitated or influenced by a partner. We aim to be the trusted partner that helps small and midsize businesses navigate the AWS ecosystem for their maximum benefit."

As part of its SCA, AWS has co-invested with Innovative Solutions in go-to-market activities in the SMB space as well as initiatives to support SMB customers on AWS. With AWS's support, Innovative has expanded its second headquarters in Boca Raton, FL in support of this strategic collaboration, brought additional products to market, and built new technology that allows growing businesses to buy AWS services instead of having to build from scratch.

"DarcyIQ helped us build upon Innovative's AWS SMB and Generative AI competencies," said Travis Rehl, CTO, Innovative Solutions. "We are clearly at the forefront of building the products and solutions that will continue to make genAI and genBI initiatives accessible to businesses of all sizes on AWS."

Innovative Solutions has specialized expertise in working with companies in manufacturing, retail, financial services, life sciences/healthcare, and leverages DarcyIQ to perform discovery, analyze customer buying intent, and ultimately generate Statements of Work in minutes. For more information about Innovative Solutions, visit .
summary: Innovative Solutions, a Premier Tier AWS Partner and global leader of Generative AI, Data, and Cloud services solutions for growing businesses, has achieved significant milestones in its Strategic Collaboration Agreement (SCA) with Amazon Web Services (AWS) focused on helping small and medium businesses (SMBs) achieve meaningful growth. Innovative Solutions was a launch partner for the AWS SMB Competency in January 2024 and is one of a small subset of AWS partners uniquely positioned to help emerging and growing companies on AWS. The company used DarcyIQ, an agentic AI consulting platform that accelerates sales, to rapidly reach, inspire, and assist SMBs with growing on the AWS cloud. As part of the SCA, Amazon has co-invested with Innovative solutions in go-to-market activities in the SMB space and initiatives to support SMB customers onAWS.
shortSummary: Innovative Solutions, a Premier Tier AWS Partner with a focus on SMBs, achieved significant milestones in its strategic collaboration with AWS, leveraging DarcyIQ to enhance sales.

Learn
How
PEOPLE +
TECHNOLOGY
Transform your IT systems to fully support your business growth strategy
Organizations spend between 3% and 7% of top-line revenue on Information Technology.
Our mission is to help businesses transition spend from investments that are merely supporting their business to investments that deliver a cohesive system for acquiring new clients, better retain existing clients, and drive more profitability year over year.
What We Do
As an AWS Premier Tier Services Partner with AWS Competencies in Generative AI, Migrations, DevOps, and Networking , we specialize in AWS cloud migrations, Managed Services, Generative AI, Application Modernization, and Cloud Operations. Our Managed Services offering aligns with your business needs and provides a true consumption-based delivery model for IT services.
Generative AI
Innovative Tailwinds is a Generative AI service that transforms your data into actionable insights.
Cloud Migrations
Want to move to the cloud efficiently and effectively? Our team can get you where you need to be.
Managed Cloud Services
Let us help you build, manage, and optimize your cloud infrastructure with Innovative Managed Cloud Services.
Managed IT Services
Managed IT Services with Innovative is completely unique. We tailor your services to exactly what your business requires.
OUR PROCESS
We take pride in understanding your business
At Innovative, the customer always comes first. There is no ‘one size fits all’ mentality. Our “Start” to “Finish” approach will guide you through every step of your digital transformation journey. Our team is flexible and will work with you to navigate the cloud in a way that aligns with your strategic business needs.
OUR EXPERTISE
As a nationally recognized AWS Premier Tier Services Partner, we have the technical expertise to partner with you throughout your entire cloud journey. Innovative is proud to be a full-service IT solutions provider that employs the best and the brightest with the latest certifications and competencies.
100%of us are cloud certified |
120+AWS certifications |
OUR PEOPLE
Your business is our passion
We’ve assembled a team of more than 100 of North America’s most gifted and talented individuals who align with their hearts first, and their minds second. Your success is our number one priority, that is why we are dedicated to doing what’s right for your business and delivering an amazing client experience every step of the way.
CULTURE
100%
Committed to
Your Success
Innovative People start by asking the right questions.
From the very first interaction, and every step along the way, we’re committed to doing what’s right for your business, your productivity, and your bottom line.
99.7%
Client Retention
We’re in this with you, to collaborate and innovate. We get to the answer together. And we follow through as a team. That’s why we have a 99.7% client retention rate.
Roadmap to the Cloud
FAQs
01. Strategic Plan
Develop a full roadmap of strategic business objectives and tactical plans.
02. Strategic Concept
Engineer high-level solutions aligned to Strategic Plan.
03. Analysis
In-depth gathering of detailed requirements and revision of Concept.
04. Design
Build out architecture diagrams, database schemas, and wireframes.
05. Ongoing Consulting / Technical Support
Review solutions and designs.

argos_summary: Innovative Solutions, a Premier Tier AWS Partner, announced key milestones in its Strategic Collaboration Agreement with AWS aimed at helping SMBs grow on the cloud. The company leveraged its DarcyIQ agentic AI platform to triple SMB customer acquisition in eight months and expanded its Boca Raton headquarters to support the partnership. AWS co‑invested in go‑to‑market activities and SMB support initiatives, while Innovative added new products and built technology that lets businesses purchase AWS services without building from scratch. With competencies in Generative AI, migrations, DevOps, and networking, Innovative offers managed services, cloud migrations, and AI solutions tailored to manufacturing, retail, finance, and life sciences. The firm emphasizes a customer‑first approach, boasting 99.7% client retention and a team of over 100 cloud‑certified professionals.
